name: Trijam 155 - Hungry Pete
description:
Play in fullscreen please The theme and the idea

This is the submission for the Trijam 155 (theme "gameplay under 1 minute").

Remember the good old days, back in the 80s when the cool kids had the first digital game watches? Playing pac man or space invader on a black and white display with only a piezo sound available? I certainly wasn't one of those cool kids - so now was my chance to use this game jam to build my own digital game watch;

You are hungry Pete looking for his next snack; "eat" the food and "reject" anything that is inedible. 

How to play
  • The game has two types of items: Food items (apple, donut, pizza and cherry) and items that should not be consumed (bomb, cat, fishbone)
  •  Use left mouse button to click on "eat" to consume the item displayed - if clicked correctly you gain points
  • Use left mouse button to click on "reject" to reject the item displayed  - if clicked correctly you gain points
  • The buttons are a bit messed up in the webgl build; try to click on the upper part of the button (too lazy to fix it - 3hrs are up, this is as good as it gets)
  • After 60seconds, the game ends
References/comments
  • Time needed: 2hrs art work, 50min coding, 10min beep sound
  • Color palette inspiration: https://coolors.co/palette/001219-005f73-0a9396-94d2bd-e9d8a6-ee9b00-ca6702-bb3e...
  • Font: Kemco Pixel,  by Jayvee Enaguas 
  • Interesting retro article on digital watch games - worth a look: https://www.digitiser2000.com/main-page/a-gallery-of-digital-watch-games
